name: Dice-ominos
description:
Spin blocks to make a 2x2 match and clear the board.

Controls:
D-Pad - Move Cursor - Arrow Keys
A button - Rotate Counter-Clockwise - A, Z, Space, Home
B button - Rotate Clockwise - B, X, Alt, Page Up
Start - Pause - Enter, Esc

Game by Michael Bufardeci
Made in Godot
Designed for the (imaginary) LTRO-1 console for Lospec Jam 1
Audio from Sebastian Tomczak
